info.description: Authentication and Authorization Service for Minisource
info.title: Auth Service API

post.description: Assign a permission to a role

delete.description: Remove a permission from a role

post.description: Create a new service client for service-to-service auth
Send OTP to email/phone for password reset
Authenticate user with email and password
Send OTP to phone or email. Auto-registers user if phone doesn't exist.
Resend OTP for email or phone verification
Verify OTP and set new password

get.description: Validate and decode service JWT token
Get OAuth accounts linked to current user

delete.description: Unlink Google OAuth account from current user

post.description: Set password for users who don't have one (OTP users)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
